QuestData.Title: Artisan's Supply: Salamanther Scales
QuestData.Description:
Are you looking for work, skinner? The Artisan's Consortium asked me to gather the scales of a salamanther for their customers.
I may be an artisan, but I am no one's errand child!
But... ah, perhaps you could find some?
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver 3 Salamanther Scales to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver 3 Salamanther Scales to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
